data.title: Caught in the Rain (1914)
data.meta_description: Caught in the Rain is a 1914 American comedy silent film starring Charlie Chaplin. This film was the first of many movies in which Chaplin both directed and played the lead. The short film was produced by Mack Sennett for Keystone Studios with a running time of 16 minutes.        Starring:  Charlie Chaplin - Tipsy hotel guest  Mack Swain - Husband  Alice Davenport - Wife  Alice Howell - Hotel guest
